A short catchisme being a briefe instruction of the most ignorant before the receiving of the sacrament of the Lord's Supper / by Obadiah Sedgewick. Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.
[13] p.
Printed for Stephen Bowtell, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible ..., London : 1647.
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library. Includes bibliographical references.
